name: Fridge Defender
description:
You are the Derottenator9000, a highly sophisticated consumer robotics apparatus for keeping refrigerators clean. Clear out the rotten food falling off the shelves before you are overwhelmed!

Made in 3 hours for TriJam.

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Up to jump
  • Z to punch
  • X to nuke (when battery is charged)
  • Eliminate fruit to charge battery
